name: I Locust Drone
description:
The game is a dozen levels of climbing out of the caverns to the planet's surface.  Climbing by jumping platform to platform.

Some shooting aspects towards the end levels.

The left gauge measures jump strength and airspeed.  The right measures jump attack angle.

Controls:

The mouse orients the locust drone. 

Left mouse button fires guns.

Right mouse button is held then released to leap.

'q' key is chase view.

'e' key is zoom view.

'F9' key toggles anti-tearing buffering

ape key returns to the main menu.
